title: Sri Lanka's central bank buys US$160mn in April

title: SriLankan flight undergoes mandatory security checks over Indian wanted suspect
byline: The security check has delayed a Singapore Airline flight

title: Foreigners buy $2 million worth Sri Lanka rupee bonds in 1 week
